refnamediv.refpurpose: internal script to bring up kernel components for netkey (xfrm)

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: _startnetkey brings up the Openswan kernel component. This involves loading any required modules.

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: The ip xfrm commands are not documented in the man page. Ask linux-net people, but do not hold your breath. See ip xfrm state help and ip xfrm policy help for the magic words.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
refsect1.para: Man page written for the Linux Openswan project <http://www.openswan.org/> by Michael Richardson.
